subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The right-hander Takashi Saito has agreed to a one-year deal with Boston, giving the Red Sox another veteran arm in their bullpen. Saito, 38, who had 18 saves and a 2.49 earned run average last season despite being limited by an elbow injury, became a free agent when the Los Angeles Dodgers did not offer him a contract by the Dec. 12 deadline.
